comments.content: There was a discussion about the proper use of primes a while ago. You can find it [here](http://web.archive.org/web/20131022005339/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/30/6682.html).

Thank you Chris and Nathan. That is what I believed to be the case, but before I sent off an e-mail to a rather prestigious design magazine, I wanted to check my facts.   
   
We're in the process of moving, and I'm living in a sort of self-imposed hell because all my reference books are neatly packed away in storage, along with most of the rest of my office. ![:-(](http://web.archive.org/web/20131022005339im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/clipart/sad.gif)
